original_text:
“Flee quickly away!
    Stay in deep caves, you who live in Hazor,”
declares the Lord.
“Nebuchadnezzar king of Babylon has plotted against you;
    he has devised a plan against you.
korean_text: 여호와의 말씀이니라 하솔 주민아 도망하라 멀리 가서 깊은 곳에 살라 이는 바벨론의 느부갓네살 왕이 너를 칠 모략과 너를 칠 계책을 세웠음이라

sentences.original_text: Nebuchadnezzar king of Babylon has plotted against you
sentences.korean_translation: 바빌론 왕 느부갓네살이 너를 대하여 모의하였느니라

sentences.original_text: he has devised a plan against you.
